titles.title: A resolution to commend Sally Goffinet on thirty-one years of service to the United States Senate.
A resolution to commend Sally Goffinet on thirty-one years of service to the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on April 30, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends Sally Goffinet upon her retirement as Parliamentary Assistant of the United States Senate for her exemplary service.
